thread.title: Absolute I&D, Orlando Initiates Reduced Pricing for International/ Industry Training, Simulation and Education Conference
thread.title_full: Absolute I&D, Orlando Initiates Reduced Pricing for International/ Industry Training, Simulation and Education Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Absolute I&D, Orlando Initiates Reduced Pricing for International/ Industry Training, Simulation and Education Conference
text:
Absolute Exhibits will offer discounted labor rates for all exhibitors at International/ Industry Training, Simulation and Education Conference in Orlando.
Las Vegas, NV (PRWEB) September 30, 2015
Trade show installation & dismantle company, Absolute I&D, services trade show exhibitors in Orlando, Florida. The majority of the I&D work done by Absolute I&D is for exhibit houses that receive discounted pricing to pass on with add-on charges to their clients, this November those same discounted savings will be offered to individual exhibitors at I/ITSEC.
The International/Industry Training, Simulation and Education Conference (I/ITSEC) is the world's largest modeling, simulation, and training conference. Running November 30 â€“ December 4 in Orlando, Florida it includes among its variety of events a commercial exhibit hall. I/ITSEC emphasizes themes related to defense and security, showcasing simulation, education, modeling and training technology for the exchange of information among industry, the military, and educational communities. The 2014 event had over 14,000 attendees and 500 exhibitors.
As a trade show management company, Absolute I&D, includes a skilled, trained and detail oriented team who can meet and deal with any show floor challenges in an competent and resourceful approach. With complete knowledge of the rules and regulations that apply to the Orange County Convention Center, Absolute I&D will lessen overtime costs during the tradeshow installation and dismantle periods. Most surprisingly, Absolute I&D has no additional hourly charges for supervision, a very rare position on the trade show floor and a win-win for independent exhibitors. A competitive Quote: is a phone call away.
About Absolute I&D Inc.:
Absolute I&D, Inc. , headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada, with site offices across the country including Orlando, Florida, offers supervised labor resources at trade shows, for corporate programs, and on consumer road tours. Absolute I&D Inc. is committed to providing clients the highest level of skilled labor, experienced project managers, and impeccable customer service. Signatory to union contracts in ten major trade show venues cross the USA and lead personnel will be flown to any other city necessary to meet client needs.
